programme.title: Don't Forget I Love You
programme.desc: Taylor opens a time capsule left by her late mother on her birthday. It contains a list of challenges that force her out of her comfort zone, giving her a chance at the possibility of love.

programme.title: Hello, It's Me
programme.desc: A widow receives messages from her late husband, urging her to move on and heal with a new man in her life.

programme.title: Romance in the Air
programme.desc: A woman gets a chance at happiness when she returns home and reunites with a childhood friend.

programme.title: Marry Me in Yosemite
programme.desc: Zoe, a notable photojournalist, visits Yosemite landscapes made famous by Ansel Adams. When she meets Jack, an intriguing tour guide, he opens her eyes to new adventures as they embark on a journey.

programme.title: Pearl in Paradise
programme.desc: A nature photographer heads to Fiji to shoot a magazine cover. She enlists the help of a romance novelist who she's convinced can help her locate a rare blue pearl.

programme.title: The Motherhood
programme.desc: Tasha poured everything into being a mom, but lost herself; with support from The Motherhood, Tasha learns to set boundaries, reclaim her space and rediscover her confidence, proving that she's not just a mom, she's Tasha too.

programme.title: The Motherhood
programme.desc: Rochelle is a superhero single mom, always putting her boys first, but now it's her turn; with support from Connie Britton and The Neighbor Ladies, she realizes that even the strongest moms deserve to prioritize themselves.

programme.desc: A scheming Frederick (Trevor Einhorn) tries to get Frasier and Lilith (Bebe Neuwirth) back together during Thanksgiving dinner.

programme.desc: Sam tries to initiate a relationship with Rebecca after discovering that she has been dreaming about him.

programme.desc: Sam is the runner-up in the race for Rebecca when she is swept off her feet by another man (Roger Rees).

programme.desc: Reba feels closer than ever to Kyra since she moved in with Brock and Barbra Jean, especially because Kyra is driving them crazy.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Competing for her father's attention, Cheyenne announces she is going to pursue a career in dentistry.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: When Barbra Jean convinces Reba to hack into Kyra's e-mail, they find out she is planning to attend an unsupervised party.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Brock lies to Kyra when she asks him about his past drug use; Cheyenne makes a confession to Van about her own brush with drugs.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Even man-hungry Blanche finds it difficult to tolerate her niece's promiscuous nature.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy needs surgery after injuring herself during tap dancing lessons.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche falls for a handsome and successful businessman but is unsure whether she wants to take on the responsibility of his young children.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche's professor tells her that she can pass her course easily, in return for unsavory favors.

programme.title: Falling for You
programme.desc: A small town's radio station manager meets her match when a visiting businessman can't seem to see beyond the screen of his laptop computer. Everything changes when she ropes him into participating in her bachelor bake-off to help save the station.

programme.title: A Picture of Her
programme.desc: After becoming the subject of an award-winning magazine cover, a woman embarks on a quest to uncover the true identity of the photographer who snapped her photo.

programme.title: Always Amore
programme.desc: Struggling to keep her late husband's Italian restaurant afloat, a woman agrees to work with a professional consultant to see if they can turn things around. At first she's resistant, but as they get closer, she realizes not all change is bad.

programme.title: Flip That Romance
programme.desc: As spring blooms, rival house flippers find themselves renovating dual sides of a duplex. As they attempt to out-do each other every step of the way, the stakes of the renovation escalate and an old romance is rekindled.

programme.title: It Was Always You
programme.desc: A woman's engagement plans get thrown into disarray when her fiance's free-spirited brother returns home.

programme.title: Roadhouse Romance
programme.desc: Lt. Callie Jackson returns home after a military tour to find her late grandfather's barbecue joint is struggling, but she has a run-in with a TV director who teaches her that sometimes it's best to look forward instead of looking back.
